items.sentence: I was hoping Tom wouldn\'t ask me to help Mary.
Do you think that Tom was the one who did that?
Do you think that might be part of the problem?
I\'m considering buying a house on Park Street.
Mary said she didn\'t know who Tom\'s wife was.
I wonder what it would take to get Tom to help.
I wonder what made Tom think he had to do that.
I had a friend named Tom when I was growing up.
Tom didn\'t really expect Mary to speak French.
Tom wouldn\'t like it if he knew you were here.
